title: Far.Cry.4.v1.03.Update-SKIDROW
description:
S  K  I  D  R  O  W                                  
                         proudly presents                        
                       Far Cry 4 v1.03 Update                            
                                                                      
                                                                       
    17-11-2014......Release Date <-> Protection...........Ubisoft DRM   
    FPS................Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX    


RELEASE NOTES
 

Read changelog.txt for information on updated content!                  

INSTALL NOTES
 1. Unpack release                                                       
 2. Run Far.Cry.4.v1.03.Update.exe                                       
 3. Install                                                              
 4. Copy everything from the SKIDROW folder into the game installation   
 5. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as      
    secure/trusted in your antivirus program                             
 6. Play the game                                                        
 7. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!            
                                                                         
ADDITIONAL NOTES
                                                                         
 This should eliminate the problems with our previous CrackFix release.  
                                                                         
 FASM failed to properly align the stack on x64, which caused troubles   
 for users on Windows 8, since our emu is made with FASM.                
                                                                         
  
GREETINGS      
 
To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!
